Episodes.Title: Uneasy Lies the Head That Wears the Crown
Episodes.Actors: Vincent Regan, Jenna Coleman, Tom Hughes
Episodes.Plot: The workers across Europe are rising up. In France, Louis Philippe has been deposed. He asks Victoria for protection, as does her half sister. In Britain, the chartists want a vote. And Victoria goes into labor with her 6th child.

Episodes.Title: Et in Arcadia
Episodes.Writer: Daisy Goodwin, Guy Andrews, A.N. Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Laurie Shepherd, Laurence Fox, John Sessions
Episodes.Plot: At Osborne House, Albert relishes the opportunity to instruct the family away from London, but Victoria is desperate to get back to the Palace and the business of politics.

Episodes.Title: Foreign Bodies
Episodes.Writer: Daisy Goodwin, Ottilie Wilford, A.N. Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hughes, Jenna Coleman, Tommy Knight
Episodes.Plot: An outbreak of cholera plagues London, while Albert is offered the seat of Chancellor at Cambridge University.

Episodes.Title: A Show of Unity
Episodes.Writer: Daisy Goodwin, Guy Andrews, A.N. Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Jenna Coleman, Lily Travers, Laurie Shepherd
Episodes.Plot: After an assassination attempt, the Royal household visits Ireland. Intrigue, conflict, and romance all blossom during a stay at the Palmerston estate. Feodora is left to her own devices in the Palace.

Episodes.Title: A Coburg Quartet
Episodes.Actors: Jenna Coleman, Tom Hughes, Louisa Bay
Episodes.Plot: A ball could not come at a worse time as private Royal family pictures are made public.

Episodes.Title: A Public Inconvenience
Episodes.Writer: Daisy Goodwin, Ottilie Wilford, A.N. Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hughes, Kate Fleetwood, Lily Travers
Episodes.Plot: Victoria must fight against her better judgment to decide where to place her allegiance.

Episodes.Title: The White Elephant
Episodes.Actors: Tom Hughes, David Newman, Jenna Coleman
Episodes.Plot: The world's eyes are on the Great Exhibition, and the Royal couple. Does triumph or failure beckon?
